name: Battle Royale MMORPG
description:
This is a multiplayer fighting game !

Join with friends to play together (playing alone is not super fun)

💿 Installation

Download the zip file for your OS and unzip it in a directory.

Run SGFL.exe to run the game.

If the game does not run, make sure you have Visual Studio Redistribuable 2022 installed : https://aka.ms/vs/17/release/vc_redist.x64.exe

🕹️ Controls

Left
A or Q or Left
RightD or Right
DownS or Down
AttackLeft Click or O
JumpW or Z or Space or Up
  • @Sygmei : Developer
  • @FEEL : Artist

Royaltee-free music by SerpentSoundStudio [Marked] : https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com/royalty-free-music/celtic-fantasy
